data.name: Jude
data.detailed_description:
In the atmospheric world of Jude:
Exploring -Exploring is a great logical tactic to complete the goal ahead of you. By understanding the structure of your current location you might allow yourself to complete the objective with more efficacy.


Survive - Be sure to always be ready to be on the run but in most cases you will need short strategic plans, precision mixed with skills, and a lot of patience to stay alive. You will understand.


Collect - You will need to keep an eye out. Your eyes will not betray you, you will need them to always be active. This will become the most important thing you do.
data.about_the_game:
In the atmospheric world of Jude:
Exploring -Exploring is a great logical tactic to complete the goal ahead of you. By understanding the structure of your current location you might allow yourself to complete the objective with more efficacy.


Survive - Be sure to always be ready to be on the run but in most cases you will need short strategic plans, precision mixed with skills, and a lot of patience to stay alive. You will understand.


Collect - You will need to keep an eye out. Your eyes will not betray you, you will need them to always be active. This will become the most important thing you do.
data.short_description: Explore the deep metroidvania world of Jude as you jump, collect, run for survival, and mentally build strategies to uncover the mysteries behind creation and purpose. Explore through the forests to the the dark side of the bayou and more as you are challenged to open the doors and find answers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel / AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1024 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 720 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 3.0 GHz or faste
  • Memory: 2000 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
